# deps/skia/src/core

set(SKIA_CORE_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/src/core")
set(SKIA_CORE_INCLUDE_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/include/core")

file(GLOB SKIA_CORE_PRIVATE_HEADERS "${SKIA_CORE_DIR}/*.h")
file(GLOB SKIA_CORE_SOURCES "${SKIA_CORE_DIR}/*.cpp")
file(GLOB SKIA_CORE_PUBLIC_HEADERS "${SKIA_CORE_INCLUDE_DIR}/*.h")

list(APPEND SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_CORE_PUBLIC_HEADERS})
list(APPEND SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_CORE_PRIVATE_HEADERS} ${SKIA_CORE_SOURCES})

set(SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_HEADERS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
